circumstances: Shortly after takeoff from the Funafuti harbor, while climbing at a height of 15 feet, the aircraft stalled and hit the water surface. Seven crew members were rescued while three others were drowned with the seaplane that sank by 100 feet deep. Crew was from the 5th Squadron.
probable_cause: The crash was caused by a mishandling of the controls by the copilot through a misunderstanding between him and the Captain.
